title: Game crashes instantly and I'm tended to reconnect again
body: Why do I get crush instantly and go back to client? It started in this patch.

replies.body:
When you say your game is crashing, are you seeing the Ziggs error screen or are you only getting disconnected? 

If you are seeing the Bug Splat error report, it might be due to some hardware driver issue. Look over [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for how to can check for any missing driver updates, and other steps you can take to prevent your client from crashing. Let me know if that helps!

I am just disconnecting. And I see the screen that includes a button of try again.

Since all you're seeing is a generic disconnected message, it sounds like this is more of issue with an unstable connection between your network and the game server. Check out our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) instead.

Let me know if that helps more!

I was having the same problem right now with an ARAM game. All other game modes ive played since patch work fine though. The game started fine but then when it would normally load up the game load screen instead the client launcher just says game in progress and then reconnect.

As far as i know my drivers are up to date. Ill redo the patch once the games over too see if that fixes it. First time having a game continually ask to reconnect without some sort of system error or a bugsplat. Not a big deal for just an Aram but it does suck dissapointing the other people trying to play that game.

Not sure if it matter but i was in the screen editing masteries when the game timer ended.
